quote: Content converts to cash. That's the number one mindset shift that agents need to have.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of viewing content as a business tool
suggested_hook: Are you still doubting the power of video content?

quote: Stop asking yourself who cares about this. People care. People want to learn.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to share their knowledge without self-doubt
suggested_hook: Think your content doesn't matter? Think again.
